duties_responsibilities.duty: Answering phone calls and written questions, concerns, and complaints regarding a member’s dues’ account.
Providing information on membership dues, policies, processes, benefits and services.
Actively listen to members and identifying their needs.
Investigating and resolving member’s payment issues.
Assessing member eligibility for status changes.
Documenting all inquiries and maintaining accurate membership records.
Troubleshoot and resolve member issues or concerns.
Data entry, handle transactions, and monitor member financial transaction records of money owed to the DGA.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
